definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: They are employed by telephone and other telecommunications transmission services establishments.
sentences.chinese: 他們受僱於電話和其他電信傳輸服務場所。

sentences.english: The transport service ensures reliable delivery and transactional integrity.
sentences.chinese: 傳輸服務可確保可靠交付和事務完整性。
